page.title: 13CLUBS THEATRE MARKFIELD
page.content: Markfield Theatre Group was born in September 1967.April 1984 saw their 50th production,"When we are Married." The initial membership of 12 has grown and now stands at 40;12 housewives,7 teachers,2 engineers,2 caretakers,a hairdresser,a postman,shop-manageress, nurse and various others.In 1973 the Group moved to South Charnwood for better facilities.1973 also saw the introduction of the annual pantomime, one of 4 or 5 shows a year to audiences totalling 2500.Production and design is also a strictly in-group function.Socially the Group enjoys activities such as treasure hunts,theatre visits,car rallies,skating,gliding,bowling, ghost walks and the annual dinner dance.
